title: Looking to start up a serious Ranked 5s Team
body:
Hey guys my IGN is pezzy I'm a silver player looking to start a ranked team in the silver to gold range 
if you're interested post fill out the following and ill get back to you. If we get good enough id love to join a tournament on Battlefly http://battlefy.com/ward-up

IGN:
Main Role:
Main Champion:
How often you're on:
Rank:
Why you want to play for my team:

replies.body:
IGN: Tazo
Main Role: Jungle/jg/tarzan
Main Champion: I play all but shaco at a level I feel comfortable in ranked, personal babes are noccy-t and vi
How often you're on: most of the time
Rank: s3
Why you want to play for my team: be able to play with a regular group in a setting that isn't my usual friends group of "lets see if we can win with all supports!", a bit more serious gameplay is always fun.

IGN: Mistaken

Main Role: jungle 

Main Champion: Kha'Zix, Lee-Sin, Nautalis, Rek'sai , Rengar

How often you're on: 1pm-2am, Everyday.

Rank: Gold 3

Age:17

Skype/teamspeak/curseVoice: Yes

Why you want to play for my team: To improve as a player and acquire valuable teamwork skills.

IGN: whitepumah

Main Role: ADC - can play any

Main Champion: twitch ashe draven

How often you're on: all day every day

Rank: silver 4

Why you want to play for my team: I am looking for a serious team that is dedicated to becoming better as a team and actually wants to make it professionally.

IGN: Iguana
Main Role: ADC
Main Champion: Jinx/ Caitlyn
How often you're on: Every day.
Rank: Silver 5. Peak: Silver 3
Why you want to play for my team: I've been desperately looking for a ranked team to play on for ages.
Any ideas for team names would be appreciated.

Support main Leona, Thresh, Taric etc
Sick of the trolls and loosers in ranked solo queue
on a bit lately.

Age: 18
Top/mid/Support player
Top 3 picks for top: {{champion:24}} {{champion:105}}  (ad fizz) {{champion:157}}  (can play yas mid as well)
top 3 picks for support:{{champion:412}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:201}} 
top 3 picks for mid: {{champion:81}}  (ap ezreal) {{champion:112}} {{champion:115}} 
commutation ([Y]/N): team speech, Skype
availability: after school most days, Wednesdays all day, weekends
Note: 9 time out of 10 i'm free but just give me a few days notice for games
IGN : DuSt235
Why you want to play for my team: wanting to play for a strong working team to climb up the ranks and achieve something.
Rank:......bronze 4, but i have been silver 3

> [{quoted}](name=pezzy,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=xAeR2vh2,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-04-03T12:17:06.645+0000)
>
> Then why leave a comment?

you want silver/ gold, that wasn't in the title.
im in provisionals still

Main Role: JG
Main Champion: Xin/Vi
How often you're on: A lot 
Rank: S1
Why you want to play for my team: Looking for a ranked team that is semi serious and that want to have fun and enter tourneys.

IGN: Volitch
Main Role: ADC
Main Champion: {{champion:429}} 
How often you're on: Everyday
Rank: Silver 4 (Gold 5 last season)
Why you want to play for my team: Im just really sick of solo q and wanna play for a serious ranked team looking at getting a coach and a manager to really go far as a team
